Reviews.Title: Getting what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: The Engineer
Reviews.Content: I looked long and hard at the variety of other "808 style" cameras being sold on Amazon.  This is the only 808 style camera that is marked "Ships from and sold by Amazon."  With that in mind, I decided there must a $27 reason for that, over the $10.99 cost of the other similar products.Most of the other reviews focused on problems dealing with documentation, manufacturing quality and support.* Documentation is excellent.  In clear and concise ENGLISH.* Manufacturing quality, no complaints.* Support, non needed.The only discrepancy in the documentation refers to red, green, yellow and blinking red/green lights.  The device contains a red and a green LED, whose lights are indirectly visible through a hole in the case.  The color "yellow" is really referring to the mixed light reflection you see when both LEDs are shining through the hole.  When the documentation refers to blinking red/green lights, they mean that because the red LED is stronger than the green one, the green will stay on and the red one will actually do the blinking.P.S. when passed through a courthouse or airport fluoroscope, the image given off is non-suspicious.  You'd have trouble if this was a "pen style camera."

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Rick Cooper
Reviews.Content: This item works as advertised. I use it for recording of jobs I visit so I have a video/audio record. The picture quality is good, doesn't handle movement well and takes a little time to adjust to light changes. Audio is good as well. If I needed to just put it on a shelf and record a nanny shaking the kid, this would show me the horrific scene just fine.

Reviews.Title: Great litte device.
Reviews.Author: Amaral
Reviews.Content: the picture quality is awesome even on dim light. I placed this on my dashboard on a night driving back home and both the video and audio quality was excellent.

Reviews.Title: Decent, and great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "tw4"
Reviews.Content: Doesn't look too bad... it's not high-quality video by any means but does the job, and at a tiny price..Changing the date/time stamp was a mess.... the version I got already had a "TAG.TXT" file in the root, dated to 2008.  When I tried to replace this with a corrected date/time in a new TAG.TXT file, the new file would be replaced by the old TAG.TXT.  Then I finally realized that, despite what most 808 date stamp suggests, I had to simply correct the date on the old TAG.TXT file, using the format found on that file:  2012-05-01 23:59:59Now, the date and time are correct.The tiny little instruction leaflet is translated in pitifully bad English.

Reviews.Title: Version #9, 720X480 video resolution
Reviews.Author: ga_archer
Reviews.Content: I was curious what verison of the 808 I would get. I was hoping to use this for mountain biking and skiing. Unfortunatly, this is version #9, one of the worst you can get. I've verified it with the information at chucklohr.com. The video is low quality 720X480 resolution, with about 30% of the frames dropped. The battery is not replaceable. I was really hoping for a version 16. Oh, well. If you gamble, sometimes you loose. Not even worth the hastle of returning.

Reviews.Title: An absolute piece of junk
Reviews.Author: TJ
Reviews.Content: I purchased this 808 Key-chain DVR/camera from “Night Owl Security” through Amazon.com in December of 2013.  This must be a #9 camera, because of the extremely poor quality of this product.  The audio is about 3 minutes out-of-sync with the video, and even the slightest movement of the camera results in a very blurry, distorted image.  The video reproduction is fair, only if you leave the camera completely motionless while recording.  I have visited an “808” website ([...] which probably gives the best advice: “Only buy an 808 by version number from a seller who lists the version number.  Otherwise you might get anything, even the worst version.”  Agreed!  I would recommend anyone interested in purchasing an 808 Key-chain camera to first explore some of the websites that describe this product’s problems.  I wish I had done that before laying out $30 for this piece of junk.  Other versions may work better, but I do not recommend anyone purchasing a #9 camera.

Reviews.Title: Had some issues
Reviews.Author: ibrophy
Reviews.Content: The recorder arrived a day quicker than estimated.  First off, there were 4 'files' already on the recorder. They were videos each about 30 minutes long, recorded in an office environment in Asia.  It looked like it had been previously used or at least the memory card inside it was.  First day using it I couldn't shut it off and it started getting warm to the touch so I had to use the reset button to shut it off.  The only other issue so far is that the clock/date setting is always wrong by a few minutes and then resets itself back to it's original time/date of a couple years ago.  The video and audio is very good.

Reviews.Title: Do Not Waste your Time & Money
Reviews.Author: Arandabond
Reviews.Content: I was hoping this item would work after reading the positive reviews, but unfortunately it did not. The Micro SD card it came with did not click into place even though I tried every possible way including watching videos of other people doing it. This made the camera unable to record pictures or video rendering it useless. I am returning it.

Reviews.Title: Cheap but does the job
Reviews.Author: Sal Mazo
Reviews.Content: Paid less than $10 so what did I expect. The product worked for a few time and after that stopped working.

Reviews.Title: fun gadget
Reviews.Author: Douglas R. Clough
Reviews.Content: Fun gadget. Clear video. Priced right. Like most gadgets, loses novelty in short time. Great tech for price. Does what's promised.

Reviews.Title: Excellent device, no a single problem
Reviews.Author: Isidro Ramirez
Reviews.Content: Excellent video and audio. Extremely easy to use. Very discrete. Large memory. Very easy to download videos. Not a single complaint.

Reviews.Title: As close to perfect as can be!
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: I ordered this nifty camera in the off chance I needed to immediately, and covertly, record something or had suspicions. Well, today I had some workers in my apartment while I was at an appointment. I had a strange feeling about them, so I set it up. While they didn't steal anything, they did rummage through some of my things and messed with my dog (who was in a kennel due to the workers being there). I can't wait to show their manager so this crap can be prevented in the future. Just ordered a few more to cover the entire apartment for next time.The audio would occasionally drop (2-3 times in a 90 minute recording), but only for maybe 2 seconds or less. Video is VERY clear.This product is more than worth the $30!

Reviews.Title: This is the one to buy. Much better than the others
Reviews.Author: zacware
Reviews.Content: i had read the reviews of other cheaper listings for this type of keychain camera and they were all bad. Also I had bought one a few years ago and had a similar bad experience. I decided to give this one a try and I am glad I did. The instructions are in English. And it actually works as described. What I did with this was I attached it to a $40 Syma quadracopter I also just bought on amazon and took a video of the top of my house this way. Very cool! (Although I don't recommend doing this if there is even a slight breeze outside or else your new toy will be swept away out of your range of control). Anyway, this is the camera to buy if you want a key-chain camera. It's in a professional looking retail style blister pack and it has readable instructions. It costs more than the other listings, but it's worth it.

Reviews.Title: Really works!
Reviews.Author: zozo
Reviews.Content: This gadget is really neat because you can record without anyone noticing. It could actually serve as a security device when you are out and about.The quality is not too bad considering the cost and length of time it will record. I recorded for well over an hour and it performed just fine. This thing does take a while to charge, the instructions said it can take 12 hours but mine was charged up in less than 3 on the initial charge.

Reviews.Title: good sound and video
Reviews.Author: TL
Reviews.Content: this is quite good even at low light. sound quality is good. easy to setup and small enough to blend in.

Reviews.Title: Just ok
Reviews.Author: Kevin
Reviews.Content: These are utilized by by our field investigators and we have had mixed results. The picture quality is surprisingly good considering the price and size of the camera unit. The problems are that the units record sound and you can't turn this feature off. Also, we received multiple units that were DOA and had to return to Amazon for refund. As usual, Amazon was great and refund our money promptly.

Reviews.Title: do not buy.  does not work.
Reviews.Author: Randall Vollen
Reviews.Content: Did not work.  Didnt take pictures or video.  It would just constantly flash rapidly.  Followed instructions, but what did I expect for $10?

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: Salty Shellback
Reviews.Content: For the price, I bought 2 of them to try.  They literally came on the slow boat from China.  It took like 4 weeks to get from when I ordered them.  I knew going in that the instructions were bad but there were plenty of reviews on youtube on how to use it.  I am pleasantly surprised how decent the video quality was.  The only complaint I really have is that the field of view is a bit small something like a 30 degree field of view and everything is close up like there is a 3x zoom on the lens.  One of the camera's view had like a 15 degree tilt to the right...lol.  The field of view would make it a terrible "spy" camera, but might be good as an audio recording device.  Also, the batteries don't last that long, maybe like 30 minutes.  Overall, I am not surprised with some of the down sides with the camera, but still impressed with it's performance given the price (about $18 shipped).

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: John Michael Clark
Reviews.Content: Delivery was great and product as promised. Better resolution than I expected. Looking forward to playing around with it and showing my friends.

Reviews.Title: Buttons do not work
Reviews.Author: Mark Santalla
Reviews.Content: It charges and the light comes on but the buttons do not make it operate as the instructions suggest.  Do not buy this item.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Saucey "What A Life"
Reviews.Content: If I could give it zero stars I would.  Total piece of crap.  Computer didn't recognize device.  Not worth time and effort to return.  Save your money!

Reviews.Title: no way to use it
Reviews.Author: Louis Brand
Reviews.Content: no instructions or directions as to the proper use of this product? no way to evaluate it if you can't use it!

Reviews.Title: Recommended!
Reviews.Author: Meow
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use in stealth mode. The software also will place a black circle over the sun if that is in the shot. Excellent picture and sound. Recommended!

Reviews.Title: A Complete Ripoff
Reviews.Author: paul b.
Reviews.Content: This product simply does not work. It lacks any type of manual or instruction. The info here talks about green and red lights. The one I received has a yellow light. No information on the model type.It does not even show up on my computer as a device when I attach it with the cable.This is a scam and I am sure they have never tested the product. Just a complete ripoff. I would recommend that you do not buy the product and Amazon should remove it. How do I get my money back? I imagine it will cost me more in shipping, gas, and time, than I will receive in a refund.This company has to know they are selling junk. I do want my money back.

Reviews.Title: It's just Okay...you get what you paid for
Reviews.Author: Bill Chen
Reviews.Content: It works and it's cheap...but that's about it.  Resolution is not very good.  it's especially bad under low light conditions.

Reviews.Title: Its an 808 and not a Nightowl
Reviews.Author: nesscakes
Reviews.Content: I received the package and it was not what I ordered. When I researched nightowl cameras, they said that it would have a green and red indicator light. This one only has a yellow light for everything. The night owl was showen with a nightowl manual. The camera that I received came with an 808 manual that leads me to the conclusion of having an 808 camera. I'm truly unhappy because I didnt want an 808. Thats the only reason I was welling to spend $19+ on this camera. I was under the impression that this was an night owl. I allowed the camera to fully charge and then I tested it. I took about 4 pictures(which were clear) but it simply stopped working. My computer stated that it malfunctioned.  So I have a camera that isn't what I bought and doesn't work. I really can't buy anything else from this company.

Reviews.Title: it works
Reviews.Author: ng
Reviews.Content: easy to work and does what it says.  i would buy it again.  worth the money.  it has video and adio

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: G. Watts
Reviews.Content: I needed a covert camera that fit my budget and still take acceptable pictures and this item meets those requirements. Although the instructions aren't the greatest they're not too difficult to figure out and after practicing with the camera a couple of times I quickly became comfortable with it. The megapixels aren't too great but again this will be used in close proximity to the object that is to be in the video/picture, and so the level of quality provided should be sufficient. There is a file on the provided 4GB flash card that you will need to access from a PC and set the date in order to get the correct stamp on the video andI would definitely recommend this for private investigators or those aspiring to be.

Reviews.Title: key chain cam
Reviews.Author: steven
Reviews.Content: The video is not clear as what is stated, It is a junk and do not waste  your money this.

Reviews.Title: Performed as promised
Reviews.Author: LAM "Ophelia"
Reviews.Content: A lot of fun.  Attached the camera to the top of a model train engine, and ran it around the track to see the little "N" gauge villages.

Reviews.Title: Night Owl Security CS-Key-4GB Video Key Chain Recorder
Reviews.Author: Danny Bissell
Reviews.Content: This thing works great it picks up sounds from up to 30ft away, I would recommend this product to freinds

Reviews.Title: same old camera
Reviews.Author: Victor Chu
Reviews.Content: This is just the same chinese camera that runs about $10-15, but with an micro sd and english instruction manual included.

Reviews.Title: I'm more than impressed.
Reviews.Author: Four Low "OffTheGrid"
Reviews.Content: This is a neat little video camera. The quality is very good. Its very hard to hold steady as you can imagine. (anti shake software can help once you download and edit video) Also its hard to know what your shooting but again that's expected. One flaw is I have had it turn on in my pocket then when I needed it its battery was dead. I solved the aiming of it by attaching a small laser light to it. Its not covert at that point just depends on the application.

Reviews.Title: One of the few 808 style with a real HD lens...great low light performance.
Reviews.Author: Calculated Tactics Group "You only truly own....
Reviews.Content: This is the best HD key-cam out right now...blows the higher $70 ones out of the water...Video Quality seems to be right on-par with the $100 LawMate 808 style, probably not as good as the $270 one...but that is also $270 vs $15...Vid Quality is great. I am follow people for a living, and often have to film them discreetly in restaurants, hotels, movie theaters, etc... This is one of the few covert cameras that you can positively ID someone in low light.You can tell you got a good one if you hold the lens to reflect light off of it. If there is a blue hue, you have an HD camera one. Video will be bright, even in low light conditions. But beware, if the reflection off the lens is red, you have a substandard copy. It will have worse low light performance and vid will be dark and somewhat distorted. There are tons of different sellers out there, this one seems to be the only one with the real HD lens in it...

Reviews.Title: Night Owl Security CS-KEY-4GB video key chain with 4 gb micro sd.
Reviews.Author: Jim Fisher
Reviews.Content: I have 3 of these, good product for the money. Rated 3 out of 5. I am satisfied with night owl cameras,I look for the name when ordering them. You have to like electronics and repair to enjoy these little cams.I use them for security. Thank you  to everyone who is involved with nigtht owl.[USAsouthernSTAR,Inc] ,and Amazon.

Reviews.Title: nice recorder
Reviews.Author: dean angel
Reviews.Content: works as ad. the insturtion was not to clear but after studing them i like the recorder it takes real good videos

Reviews.Title: Lots of background noise, but it has helped me out
Reviews.Author: Jason K.
Reviews.Content: I am a police officer, and this has protected me from complaints already.  Would recommend to all looking for liability protection

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: CKJ
Reviews.Content: I got this after looking at all of the positive reviews, and thought it may be one of the better ones. I was obviously wrong. The video quality is very poor. The only reason you can claim the instructions are in English is because there are English words, but they make no sense whatsoever. "Long push video light long time."I guess I won't feel bad strapping this to a rocket and sending it up 2,000'. If it doesn't come back, no big loss.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Paul C Vigil
Reviews.Content: This product is great, but buy it from someone other than Amazon.  Customer service is terrible and refuses to provide any help whatsoever if anything goes wrong.  You are MUCH better off paying a little more and buying from a retailer you can trust.

Reviews.Title: won't turn on, let alone record.
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: I got this to find out who might be stealing my tools. It doesn't work. Don't waste your money on this junk.

Reviews.Title: Night Owl
Reviews.Author: elvis
Reviews.Content: Video was not very good. But about what I would expect for the price. Was flying on my helicopter but it crashed and the camera stopped working. Cant blame it on the camera, it was a hard landing

Reviews.Title: Mine was a piece of junk
Reviews.Author: Denise O "Denise O"
Reviews.Content: I ordered the item and a bigger sized sd card. When I went to put the sd card in, it went right into the keychain. It literally fell inside the keychain. I had to open the keychain up to get the card out. I was so angry that I threw it away and I will never buy another one of these. I'd rather spend more money on something made better since it looks exactly like the ones other people sell on amazon for $12 or $13. It was a big disappointment.

Reviews.Title: Records for about a sec
Reviews.Author: shaughnessy
Reviews.Content: Does not work. Records for  a couple sec then no pic after. If it worked it would be great. Sucky

ProductInfo.Features:
Record video clips on the go
Audio recording up to 20 feet away
Record up to 2 Hours of Video/Audio
4GB Micro SD Card Included
Connects easily to your computer
ProductInfo.Name: Night Owl Security CS-Key-4GB Video Key Chain Recorder with 4 GB Micro SD Card
